abstract: A veritable army of the social media savvy are searching for a marrow donor for Amit Gupta.
snippet: A veritable army of the social media savvy are searching for a marrow donor for Amit Gupta.
lead_paragraph: Amit Gupta, the founder of the photography Web site Photojojo, received an outpouring of support from fans, friends and his more than 14,000 Twitter followers after he announced that he had acute leukemia and needed a bone marrow donor right away.
